articles.title: Chrysler to relaunch Canadian-made gas-powered 300 sedan, as auto show pivots to electric future - CBC News
articles.description: After a two-year hiatus due to the pandemic, the biggest car show in North America is starting up again in Detroit this week, giving consumers their first glimpse into what the trillion-dollar auto industry has up its sleeve.

articles.title: Medical videos on YouTube often provide incomplete information - EurekAlert
articles.description: Implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) information on YouTube is of low and highly-variable quality, according to research presented at the American College of Cardiology (ACC) Quality Summit 2022.

articles.title: President Cyril Ramaphosa to attend Queen Elizabeth's funeral - News24
articles.description: In a statement on Wednesday, it was announced that Ramaphosa will first embark on a "working visit to the United States of America and the United Kingdom to respectively build relations with South Africa's third largest trade partner."
